name: The Metamorphosis / Visual Novel
description:
One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin.
"What's happened to me?" he thought. It wasn't a dream.

The Metamorphosis is a novella written by Franz Kafka first published in 1915. One of Kafka's most famous works, The Metamorphosis tells the story of salesman Gregor Samsa who wakes up one morning to find himself inexplicably transformed into a giant insect that struggles to adapt to this new state.



- The original story of 'The Metamorphosis', in visual novel format.

- Illustrated with unique cgs, character art and backgrounds.
